articles.title: Australia's best pool cleaner is $200 off for a limited time only
articles.summary: Amazon Australia is offering the WYBOT C1 Robotic Pool Cleaner, a cordless device with 145 minutes of battery life designed to clean pool floors and walls. The WYBOT C1, which is currently 22% off on Amazon, features smart navigation and the ability to clean various surfaces. Customers have praised its convenience, cleaning ability, and value.

articles.title: Honor Magic7 Pro 5G: AI-Powered Flagship Arrives with 200MP Camera and Enhanced Safety
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: HONOR is launching the HONOR Magic7 Pro 5G, a new flagship smartphone, emphasizing AI capabilities and a 200MP camera. The phone features AI-driven security, including Deepfake detection, and AI translation for global connectivity. A blind booking campaign offers exclusive benefits like a free HONOR Watch 4 and discounts until February 10, 2025, with deliveries starting February 22, 2025.

articles.title: How to Do Amazon Advertising: Boost Your Success
articles.summary: Amazon Advertising offers various ad formats like Sponsored Products, Brands, and Display Ads to enhance visibility and sales. Sponsored Products increase individual product sales, Sponsored Brands elevate brand awareness, and Sponsored Display Ads facilitate retargeting. Effective campaigns require keyword research, performance analysis (CTR, ACOS), A/B testing, and adaptation to seasonal trends.

articles.title: Chery Tiggo 4 Pro recalled
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: CarExpert is currently offering hundreds of new car deals. Customers can browse the deals available through their platform to potentially secure a great price on a new car.

articles.title: Record-Breaking Franchise Growth in 2024 Sets Stage  for Tide Services' 2025 Expansion
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Tide Services, including Tide Laundromat and Tide Cleaners, expanded in 2024 with franchise agreements and new locations across the US. Looking to 2025, Tide Services will expand Tide Laundromats through new and existing franchisees and accelerate growth on the Tide Cleaners side through continued acquisitions. Backed by Procter & Gamble, Tide Services continues to grow.

articles.title: How Web Design and Content Play a Crucial Role in Building a Strong Brand Identity
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Rhino Web Studios, a New Orleans-based web development agency, emphasizes the importance of a strong digital presence in building brand identity and offers custom website creation services. Their service involves aligning web design and content with a business's brand values to resonate with customers, build trust, and encourage long-term loyalty.

articles.title: This $10 body scrub is an exact swap for Fresh's iconic $69 Brown Sugar Polish
articles.author: Jennifer Romolini
articles.summary: Brooklyn Botany launched its Brown Sugar Body Scrub, a product designed to replicate and improve upon Fresh's Brown Sugar Body Polish. The scrub features natural ingredients like brown sugar and sweet almond oil, along with vitamin E and arnica, priced at $10 for a smaller tub.

articles.title: Model ML: $12 Million (Seed) Raised To Create Transformative AI Workspaces For Financial Services
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Model ML launched its AI platform, designed for professionals, particularly in finance, with $12 million in funding. The platform integrates into existing workflows, allowing voice-based queries and automated creation of reports and dashboards. Early customers report improved efficiency and are rewriting business strategies based on the platform's impact.

articles.title: SOURCIX Launches AI-Powered Sourcing Platform To Empower Manufacturers With Seamless Procurement
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: SOURCIX, an AI-powered procurement platform, offers a service designed to simplify vendor matching and streamline procurement for fabricated metal parts. AGD has adopted SOURCIX's service for development and prototype projects.

articles.title: Yaman Coskun Returns To Radio With New AI Creative Offering
articles.author: Cameron Coats
articles.summary: Yaman Coskun, former CEO of Yamanair Creative, launched yaman.AI, a creative services company that offers local-direct-focused commercial creative services, sales tools, training, consultations, and production support across various media. yaman.AI also introduces yaman.PI (Performance Intelligence), a local creative testing feature for campaign refinement.

articles.title: The best Valentine's Day flower delivery services for your loved one, tested and reviewed
articles.author: Amanda Garrity
articles.summary: 1-800-Flowers, FTD, ProFlowers and Teleflora are online flower delivery services that utilize local florists to fulfill orders. These services prioritize freshness and quality, and are being reviewed based on wow factor, freshness, packaging, presentation, and value for Valentine's Day bouquets.

articles.title: AI Takes the Spotlight During Super Bowl 59—and People Aren't Mad About It
articles.author: Trishla Ostwal
articles.summary: Several companies, including GoDaddy, Google, Meta, and OpenAI, showcased their AI-driven products and services during Super Bowl 59. GoDaddy highlighted Airo, its AI tool for building websites. Google introduced Gemini-powered voice AI on Google Pixel. Meta advertised Ray-Ban smart glasses, and OpenAI featured ChatGPT while also introducing its video tool, Sora.  The ads varied in reception, with some sparking genuine engagement and others facing criticism for unclear messaging or failing to effectively demonstrate product capabilities.

articles.title: Nykaa's Q3 net profit jumps 52% to Rs 26.4 crore
articles.author: ETtech
articles.summary: Nykaa is expanding its quick commerce offerings to meet consumer demand for faster deliveries, with 70% of beauty orders in top cities delivered the same or next day. The company is also focusing on the premiumization of its beauty category to capitalize on the growing luxury beauty market in India.

articles.title: Did You Know Muji Makes a Great Wool Sweater (That's $56 Right Now)?
articles.author: Liza Corsillo
articles.summary: Muji launched Muji Labo last fall, a collection focusing on refined basics. A key product from this line is a yak wool funnel-neck sweater, praised for its warmth, softness, and drape. Currently, the sweater is available on sale for $56 in brown, butter yellow, and charcoal gray.

articles.title: Amazon Canada is selling a 'stylish' and 'lightweight' vacuum for 70% off right now — snag it for less than $180
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: Amazon Canada is offering the Ljuren Cordless Vacuum Cleaner at a 70% discount, priced under $180. The vacuum provides up to 35 minutes of continuous cleaning, features a five-layer filtration system, an LED rotating brush head, and a one-touch dust release. Early reviews highlight its lightweight design, strong suction power, and ease of use.

articles.title: Dy CM opens Mathi experience store
articles.author: DC Correspondent
articles.summary: Deputy Chief Minister Udhayanidhi Stalin inaugurated a Mathi Experience Store inside the Secretariat premises. This store sells products manufactured by members of women Self-Help Groups. The first Mathi Experience store was opened on November 18, 2023.

articles.title: Insiders reveal how Netflix engineered Meghan Markle's last-ditch attempt to save her brand… by hawking her jams in US mega malls
articles.author: Merry
articles.summary: Meghan Markle is launching her American Riviera Orchard brand, offering jam, honey, and olive oil, in new Netflix House stores opening in March. The success of these products is tied to the launch of her new Netflix show. Netflix hopes to expand stores worldwide, which would be huge for Meghan's brand.

articles.title: Insiders reveal how Netflix engineered Meghan Markle's last-ditch attempt to save her brand... by hawking her jams in US mega malls
articles.author: Daily Mail
articles.summary: Markle is set to launch her brand in a few weeks. The brand is expected to offer items such as jam, tea, coffee, wallpaper, and pet shampoo.

articles.title: Shoppers say this top-rated hair dryer works like a Dyson — and it's on sale for just $30
articles.author: Korin Miller
articles.summary: Loveps is offering a new hair dryer as an alternative to the Dyson Supersonic. The Loveps hair dryer utilizes ionic technology, has 1,800 watts of power, adjustable settings, foldable handle and comes with magnetic attachments and is available on Amazon for $29.

articles.title: Bluevine Business Checking Review: Features, Fees, and Benefits
articles.author: Patrick Murray
articles.summary: Bluevine is offering a digital business checking account that includes a high 1.5% APY on balances up to $250,000. This account has no monthly fees, unlimited transactions, and integrates with QuickBooks and Xero. However, cash deposits are limited and subject to fees via Green Dot locations.

articles.title: Monetize Apps With Fewer Ads: Honeygain SDK Offers a Seamless Revenue Solution
articles.summary: Honeygain SDK launched a new monetization model enabling developers to generate income by allowing users to contribute unused internet bandwidth, instead of relying on traditional advertisement. The SDK offers a seamless app experience for users while ensuring global monetization for developers, and revenue is consistent, independent of user engagement.

articles.title: [Official Website] Nexagen Male Enhancement– Is It Right For You?
articles.author: Malebiotix999
articles.summary: Nexagen has launched Nexagen Testosterone Booster, a dietary supplement aimed at improving men's sexual health and energy. The supplement contains natural ingredients to enhance libido, improve endurance, and support hormonal balance, targeting issues like erectile dysfunction and low energy levels.

articles.title: SOAX Releases Real-Time Data Extraction for Shopee, Outperforms Other Web Scrapers
articles.author: Soax
articles.summary: SOAX has released a new scraper API product designed to extract data from Shopee. Initial tests suggest the Shopee Scraper API performs better than other web data scrapers at a lower cost. The new API will help businesses monitor competitor prices, improve products via review analysis, and track minimum advertised prices (MAP).

articles.title: Your New Favorite Sex Toy Might Be a Drugstore 'Egg'
articles.author: Kate Knibbs
articles.summary: Tenga, a Japanese company founded in 2005, offers a wide range of sex gadget products. These include traditional vibrators, lotions, and other items related to sexual wellness and pleasure.

articles.title: NYT Connections Hints and Answers for Monday, February 10, 2025
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Various companies and individuals are introducing new courses and masterclasses. Metla Sudha Sekhar is offering courses in AI, web development, and office productivity. Elearnmarkets presents a course on finance. Inara Marketers, Seth Godin, and Pam Moore are offering marketing masterclasses.

articles.title: Blue Digital Media Transforms Content Marketing with AI-Driven Educational Strategies
articles.author: Country: Canada
articles.summary: Blue Digital Media launched a new AI-driven platform that merges AI with educational content marketing. The platform uses AI to curate and distribute content, enhancing brand credibility and reach. The platform integrates educational content into marketing channels and offers analytics for strategy refinement.

articles.title: Move Quickly And Quietly! The Latest And Greatest Kindle Paperwhite Is Finally On Sale
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Kindle Paperwhite, a premium e-reader, with a 16% discount. The Kindle Paperwhite features a waterproof body, a 7-inch screen, and a 12-week battery life. The 12th generation Kindle Paperwhite has a glare-free display, adjustable warm light settings, and 16 GB of storage.

articles.title: McDonald's gives customers 15 per cent off orders for 1 day
articles.author: Katie Collier
articles.summary: McDonald's is offering a 15% discount on orders for MyMcDonald's Rewards members through the McDonald's app, available for one day only (February 10). Additionally, McDonald's will launch the Shamrock Shake in the UK on March 12 for a limited two-week period. This shake features a peppermint-flavored syrup blended with a creamy milkshake base.

articles.title: Astra Nova Partners with NVIDIA to Revolutionize AI Entertainment
articles.author: Cryptopolitan Media
articles.summary: Astra Nova, a gaming platform built with Unreal Engine 5 and powered by NVIDIA's AI technology, is launching on Shibarium ($SHIB's own Layer-2 blockchain platform designed to enhance the $SHIB's ecosystem). This launch will enhance the rewards system and provide faster transactions, marking a significant expansion of Astra Nova's ecosystem.

articles.title: Utah-Based Soda Chain Swig to Open in Brentwood
articles.author: Donna Vissman
articles.summary: Swig is launching a new location in Brentwood, Tennessee on February 27, 2025, offering free 24 oz drinks to customers from Feb. 27 to March 1. The menu includes Dirty Sodas, Refreshers, Revivers, pink sugar cookies, and warm pretzel bites. Swig will also open a location in Spring Hill this Spring.

articles.title: From Lace to Silk – Valentine's Lingerie That Screams ‘Wow'
articles.summary: Brief Essentials offers lingerie sets like the 'Dot Your Eyes Chemise & G-String Set' for ₦32,500, the 'Tidal Waves Chemise & G-String Set' for ₦25,000, the 'DORINA Daphne Wired Bodysuit' for ₦17,225, and the 'Red Carpet Ready Chemise and G-String' for ₦20,500. La Senza features products like the 'Unlined Mesh Bodysuit with Rosettes' for ₦100,900, the 'Unlined Short Merrywidow with Bow' for ₦78,500, the 'Mesh Untie Me Babydoll' for ₦67,200, the 'Unlined Babydoll with Rosette' for ₦100,900, and the 'Satin Dress' for ₦89,700.

articles.title: Mould: how can it affect your health?
articles.author: Ella Pickover
articles.summary: TUI offers £200 off bookings over £2000. Cult Beauty provides 15% off orders over £25. ASOS gives 10% off first orders over £20. Travelodge offers 5% off bookings. Currys has a tablet sale with at least 30% off, including iPads.

articles.title: Huge Amazon Alexa upgrade expected this month - but you may have to pay for it
articles.author: Ewan Mowat
articles.summary: Amazon is reportedly launching a new version of its Alexa voice assistant with enhanced capabilities, including more natural interactions and complex task handling. The company may also unveil new Echo speakers and Fire TV Sticks at a reveal event in New York. Speculation suggests the enhanced Alexa might come with a subscription price of £7.70 per month.

articles.title: Just in case you've forgotten all about them, AMD posts a less-than-convincing argument as to why AI PCs are better than any other type of PC
articles.author: Nick Evanson
articles.summary: AMD is attempting to promote its 'AI PCs' which are equipped with Neural Processing Units (NPUs), arguing that they handle AI tasks more efficiently compared to non-AI PCs. AMD claims its AI PCs support the CPU and GPU for faster and smarter everyday use. The company says non-AI PCs can run AI tasks, but with less efficiency for multitasking.

articles.title: Nykaa Q3 Profit Surges 61% To Rs 26 Cr
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: Nykaa has invested in marketing and co-created a celebrity brand named Kay Beauty with Bollywood star Katrina Kaif. The company's beauty segment offers products from domestic and international high-end brands, contributing to a 27% increase in earnings for the quarter.

articles.title: Reliance enters sports drinks market with 'Spinner' priced at Rs 10
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Reliance Consumer Products Limited (RCPL) has launched a new sports drink called "Spinner," co-created with Muttiah Muralitharan, priced at Rs 10 in India. Spinner comes in three flavors: Lemon, Orange, and Nitro Blue. The company has partnered with top IPL teams to drive awareness and increase brand visibility nationwide.

articles.title: Easily Create Unlimited WordPress Websites Without Subscription Fees
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: A new service enables users to create websites quickly and efficiently, even without prior technical experience. This offers a simplified web development solution.

articles.title: Major fashion shop to open in York city centre
articles.author: Craig Jones
articles.summary: Rodd and Gunn, a New Zealander men's clothing retailer, is launching a new store in Stonegate, York. Pranzo, an Italian restaurant, will soon launch their latest venue in Church Street, York.

articles.title: This Small Robot Vacuum Saves Me an Hour Every Day
articles.author: Jowi Morales
articles.summary: SwitchBot launched the Mini Robot Vacuum K10+ Pro, featuring a compact design and an auto-empty station requiring maintenance only once per quarter. The K10+ Pro is available for $599.99 and can be controlled via the SwitchBot app for advanced features like home mapping and scheduling. It is designed for cleaning in tight spaces and comes with accessories to clean your house.

articles.title: Zoho Corporation Unveils AI-Powered Zia Agents, Agent Studio, and Agent Marketplace Across MENA
articles.author: The Daily Tribune
articles.summary: Zoho Corporation launched its latest AI innovations across key markets. These AI solutions are developed using Zoho's engineering expertise and data centers and shared data model.

articles.title: Omagh bombing victim found by husband face down in the rubble, inquiry hears
articles.author: Jonathan Mccambridge
articles.summary: TUI offers £200 off bookings over £2000, while Cult Beauty provides a 15% discount on orders above £25. ASOS gives 10% off first orders over £20, and Travelodge offers 5% off bookings. Currys is having a tablet sale with at least 30% off, including iPads.

articles.title: PM will not hesitate to take action if ministers do not uphold standards
articles.author: Pa Political Staff
articles.summary: TUI offers £200 off bookings over £2000 with a voucher code. Cult Beauty provides a 15% discount on orders over £25 using a discount code. ASOS is giving 10% off first orders over £20 with a promo code. Travelodge provides 5% off bookings with a discount code, while Currys offers at least 30% off in their tablet sale, including iPads.

articles.title: "It's over for Blinkit, Zepto, and Instamart': Indian startup claims to deliver a human in 10 minutes, sparks heated debate
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Topmate.io, an Indian startup, has launched a service that provides instant access to industry experts for career mentorship, offering customized guidance on job hunting, professional growth, and problem-solving. Available from 6 PM to 10 PM daily, Topmate.io aims to connect consumers to a network of 300,000 professionals and creators for mentorship.

articles.title: Woman who accuses PhD student of rape was 'angry and ashamed after attack'
articles.author: Tristan Kirk
articles.summary: TUI offers £200 off bookings over £2000 with a voucher code. Cult Beauty provides 15% off orders over £25 with a discount code. ASOS gives 10% off first orders over £20 using a promo code. Travelodge offers 5% off bookings with a discount code. Currys has at least 30% off in the tablet sale, including iPads.

articles.title: UK Drive: Mazda3 becomes more refined thanks to new engine
articles.author: Cameron Richards
articles.summary: Mazda has introduced a new 2.5-litre petrol engine with mild-hybrid technology for its Mazda3 hatchback, replacing the previous 2.0-litre engine. This new engine offers 138bhp and 238Nm of torque, with Mazda claiming improved efficiency and performance, achieving 47.1mpg and CO2 emissions as low as 135g/km.

articles.title: Husband of Omagh bombing victim challenges inquiry to deliver truth for victims
articles.author: Jonathan Mccambridge
articles.summary: TUI offers £200 off bookings over £2000. Cult Beauty provides 15% off orders exceeding £25. ASOS gives 10% off first orders over £20. Travelodge discounts bookings by 5%. Currys discounts tablets by at least 30%, including iPads.

articles.title: Next shoppers love £14 perfume gift set perfect for Valentine's Day
articles.author: Nadia Breen
articles.summary: Next is offering a Set of 6 Mini Perfumes Discovery Set for under £15, featuring top scents in mini bottles. The set includes Just Pink Eau de Parfum and other favorite Next perfumes like Eau Nude and White Amber. Other options available from LookFantastic are Jo Malone London Cologne Discovery Collection and Sephora's Molton Brown Woody and Floral Fragrance Discovery Gift Set.

articles.title: Redmi Note 14: Great display, decent camera, good battery on a budget
articles.author: Md Tajul Islam
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched the Redmi Note 14, a budget smartphone featuring a 6.67-inch AMOLED display with HDR10+ support and a 120Hz refresh rate. It is powered by a MediaTek Helio G99-Ultra processor with up to 8GB of RAM and offers a 256GB storage option, coupled with a 5,500mAh battery supported by 33-watt turbocharging.

articles.title: As Gmail Attack Warnings Surge—Do Not Switch To New App
articles.author: Davey Winder
articles.summary: Google has introduced new AI-driven security measures to strengthen Gmail's defenses against phishing, malware, and spam.  These measures include a large language model trained to identify malicious patterns, resulting in a 20% reduction in spam and phishing attacks. Google also implemented stricter sender authentication protocols, leading to a significant decrease in unauthenticated emails reaching Gmail users.

articles.title: Oppo Find N5: Global launch date ANNOUNCED! Will it come to India? Here's what we know
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Oppo will unveil its next-generation foldable phone, the Oppo Find N5, globally on February 20th. The phone is touted as the thinnest foldable available and boasts an almost undetectable crease. It is anticipated to be released in India as the OnePlus Open 2 during the second half of 2025.

articles.title: OMD Worldwide unveils new positioning with brand refresh and updated red logo
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: OMD Worldwide, an Omnicom Media Group agency, introduced a new positioning, 'We Create What's Next,' supported by a brand refresh enabled by Canva. This move aims to help brands drive sales and expand market share using OMD's expertise, technology, and scale. In 2024, OMD added Gap Inc., Michelin, AliExpress, and Turkish Airlines to its client roster.

articles.title: monday.com Announces AI Vision to Empower Businesses to Scale
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: monday.com announced its AI Vision, which represents its key focus areas for 2025. The company's strategy will focus on AI Blocks, Product Power-ups, and the Digital Workforce. The goal is to democratize the power of software.

articles.title: monday.com Announces Full Release of monday service, its AI Enterprise Service Management Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: monday.com launched monday service, an AI-first Enterprise Service Management (ESM) platform, after its beta phase. This platform aims to empower service teams to deliver exceptional support experiences faster across the organization.

articles.title: monday.com Announces AI Vision to Empower Businesses to Scale
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: monday.com announced its AI Vision, focusing on AI Blocks, Product Power-ups, and a Digital Workforce. The company plans to launch its first AI agent, monday Expert, in March to assist users with onboarding and platform guidance. This offering includes a flexible pricing model with free AI credits and scalable options for larger organizations.

articles.title: Canada's Manmade Sees Record-Breaking Growth Following Super Bowl Ad Debut English
articles.author: Manmade
articles.summary: Manmade, a Canadian men's basics brand, experienced record-breaking growth in sales, web traffic, and social media engagement after debuting its Super Bowl LIX ads. This led to the brand's best February sales since launch and millions of pageviews across Canada.

articles.title: Canada's Manmade Sees Record-Breaking Growth Following Super Bowl Ad Debut
articles.author: Manmade
articles.summary: Manmade, a Canadian men's basics brand, experienced record growth in sales, web traffic, and social media engagement following their Super Bowl LIX ad debut. The ads promoted their line of comfortable and durable boxer briefs, T-shirts, socks, and pants, resulting in significant positive reception from Canadian consumers.

articles.title: 40 Products For People Who Live Solo That Just Make Sense
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of products available on Amazon, ranging from kitchen gadgets like mini air fryers and vegetable choppers to home organization solutions such as couch pillows with cup holders and under-cabinet lid openers. It also features cleaning tools like no-scrub shower cleaner and drill brush cleaning kits, as well as innovative items like timed safety shut-off plugs and magnetic duvet clips, most of the products are small businesses that can be found in Shark Tank.

articles.title: Your New Favorite Sex Toy Might Be a Drugstore 'Egg
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Tenga, a sex toy company, has a loyal following. A popular product is disposable 'eggs'.

articles.title: Infinite Set Technology, Inc., Launches the Haptics of Things® (HoT®) to Revolutionize Digital Branding
articles.author: Mark Salada
articles.summary: Infinite Set Technology, Inc. has launched Haptics of Things® (HoT®), a new application programming interface (API) designed for exchanging physical sensations over the internet. This service allows businesses to send unique vibration patterns associated with their product or service, creating a new dimension of customer engagement and brand identity. The HoT® SDK is available for Android and iOS integration and anticipates expansion to other platforms.

articles.title: Your new favorite sex toy could be a ‘egg' pharmacy
articles.author: Elijah
articles.summary: HAV's eggs are discreetly designed sex toys aiming for broader appeal. Their accessible aesthetics and ambiguous appearance position them as lifestyle merchandise, with a focus on well-being. The company targets countries becoming increasingly conservative by selling the eggs in locations such as Ginza (Japan) and as stress relief balls.

articles.title: Using smart technologies, artificial intelligence in food packaging can reduce food waste
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Smart food packaging innovations offer real-time food quality monitoring using sensors and AI to measure spoilage indicators, tracking food freshness dynamically.  These technologies, including Lab-in-a-Package and sprayable bacteriophage microgels, aim to reduce food waste, enhance food safety, and improve distribution efficiency.  Policymakers can incentivize adoption through tax benefits and subsidies to encourage wider use.

articles.title: Brand new Terry's Chocolate Orange treat now available in supermarkets for Easter
articles.author: Rachel Cronin
articles.summary: Terry's Chocolate Orange has launched a new product, a Chocolate Orange egg filled with orange-flavored cream and coated in dark chocolate. The egg is available in various UK supermarkets such as Tesco and Asda and is being marketed as an orangey alternative to the Cadbury Creme Egg. Initial reactions are mixed, with some consumers praising its taste and texture while others criticize its availability and fondant filling.

articles.title: Duracell's First-Ever Big Game Ad Reveals How It's Built Different
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Duracell unveiled its first creative ad spot during the big game on Sunday.

articles.title: Here's you can manage Meesho's vast catalog
articles.summary: Meesho has introduced a 'Favorites' function within its Android app. Users can access this feature after launching the app and browsing or searching for specific items. The 'Favorites' function allows users to save products they are interested in for future consideration.

articles.title: The Future of Intimacy Is Here: Lovense Unveils Lush 4 for A More Connected Valentine's Day
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Lovense has launched Lush 4, a Bluetooth-controlled G-spot vibrator, featuring enhanced performance and integration with the Lovense Remote App. Additionally, Lovense offers its AI Pleasure Companion in beta within the Lovense Remote App, providing personalized erotic storytelling synced with Lovense devices.

articles.title: "It's over for Blinkit, Zepto, and Instamart': Indian startup claims to deliver a human in 10 minutes, sparks heated debate
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Topmate.io, an Indian startup, is launching a service providing instant access to career mentorship from industry experts in 10 minutes. This platform aims to connect users with professionals for customized guidance on job hunting, professional growth, and problem-solving. The service is available from 6 PM to 10 PM daily.

articles.title: How to get 15 per cent off your McDonald's order for 1 day only this week
articles.author: Katie Collier
articles.summary: McDonald's is offering customers a 15% discount on their orders this Monday through the MyMcDonald's Rewards app. Additionally, McDonald's will launch the Shamrock Shake, a peppermint-flavored milkshake, in the UK on March 12 for two weeks only. McDonald's also offers Deal Drops every Monday through their app.

articles.title: People ‘gobsmacked' after realising there's a secret button on some washing machines that means it NEVER needs cleaning
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Hotpoint washing machines have a hidden "self-clean mode" which can be activated by pressing and holding the rinse button for five seconds. This feature helps keep the machine fresh, clean, and working at its best, and it also exists on some Samsung, AEG, Beko and Nokia washing machines.

articles.title: People ‘gobsmacked' after realising there's a secret button on some washing machines that means it NEVER needs cleaning
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Hotpoint washing machines have a 'self-clean mode' activated by pressing and holding the rinse button, keeping the machine fresh and working well. This feature, unknown to many users, helps prevent mould, mildew, and odours, extending the appliance's lifespan when used monthly.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans set for frenzy over Dyson vacuum dupe with two modes – and it's €440 cheaper
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland introduced a cordless vacuum cleaner priced at €59.99 and a Vileda Spray and Clean mop for €19.99, emphasizing affordability and convenience. Lidl also launched a new fitness tracker with essential health monitoring features at a budget-friendly price point, aiming to compete with premium brands.

articles.title: Google Photos New Feature Update: Tech Giant Introduces SynthID in Magic Editor To Watermark AI-Generated Images
articles.author: Deepak Gharai
articles.summary: Google Photos introduced the SynthID feature to watermark and identify AI-generated content within the app, specifically images modified using generative AI through the Reimagine feature in Magic Editor. The digital watermarks embedded via SynthID helps users determine if the content was produced using Google's AI tools. Furthermore, Apple is preparing to launch the iPhone SE 4.

articles.title: Hair removal device that promises 'softer legs' in just 'weeks' has price cut by £140
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Keskine has launched the Keskine IPL hair remover, featuring ice-cooling technology for painless hair removal. The product is marketed as a cheaper and effective alternative to laser treatments with a 90-day money-back guarantee. Customer reviews indicate positive results, noting softer skin and reduced hair growth, though some express concerns about the device's long-term durability.

articles.title: Oppo Find N5 confirmed to launch on February 20: Slim design, Snapdragon 8 Elite chip and all we know
articles.summary: Oppo is set to unveil its next-gen foldable phone, the Oppo Find N5, on February 20th globally, except for India. The Find N5 is touted as the slimmest foldable phone, featuring a significantly less noticeable crease and a potentially titanium frame. The phone is expected to be rebranded as the OnePlus Open 2 for the Indian market and might include features like a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a 6,000mAh battery, and wireless charging.

articles.title: These Amazon headphones sound better than my AirPod Pros for half the price
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Edifier's NeoDots offer excellent sound quality and premium features. These NeoDots are designed as an alternative to AirPods.

articles.title: 대전시, ‘대전 꿈돌이 라면' 5월 출시 목표 시식평가회 개최
articles.author: 김정환 기자
articles.summary: Daejeon City is preparing to launch 'Daejeon Dream Ramen' in May, with final packaging and flavor decisions expected in February. Two flavors, 'Beef Flavor' and 'Seafood Jjamppong Flavor', are being evaluated through tasting events with city staff and citizens to gather feedback for the final product development.

articles.title: 25 Amazing Hair Products From Target That Really And Truly Work
articles.author: Julia Lynn Rubin
articles.summary: Target offers a wide array of hair care products, including dry shampoo, hair elastics, sleep scrunchies, leave-in treatment sprays, texture foam mousse, hair masks, scalp scrubs, scalp massagers, speed dry brushes, hair and scalp oils, curl definers, repairing shampoos, heat protector sprays, flat irons, anti-dandruff shampoos, therapy session masks, hair gels, bun twists, jojoba hair oil, hair spray, hair waver, detangler, smoothing shampoo, and claw clips. These products aim to address various hair concerns, such as dryness, damage, frizz, and lack of volume, while providing solutions for styling, conditioning, and overall hair health.

articles.title: Lundrigo, a non-face-to-face mobile laundry service operated by the food, clothing, and shelter comp..
articles.author: Lee Hojun.
articles.summary: Lundrigo, a mobile laundry service by the food, clothing, and shelter company, experienced a 20% increase in laundry orders in January due to the cold wave. In response, Lundrigo is offering a discount promotion during cold wave warnings, including 3,000 point payback for existing users and welcome coupons for new users, featuring free delivery, 50% off foot washing, and 7,000 won for laundry support.

articles.title: 38 Tiny But Deeply Useful Products You Might Not Have Heard Of Yet
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies have recently introduced new products to the market. The Pink Stuff launched a new Sqeezy sponge set for cleaning, while Dr. Scholl's introduced a Roll-On Foot Pain Relief Liquid. Other new products include Catrice's Instant Awake Under Eye Brightener, Dae's Hair Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand, Oxo's compact Brew Rapid Brewer, and Naked Sundays CabanaClear SPF 50 Water Gel Serum.

articles.title: CTV National News: New app identifies Canadian made products
articles.summary: A newly developed app allows users to scan items. The app's purpose is to determine if a product is Canadian made.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 likely to fix display crease issue- All details
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7, its new generation foldable smartphone. The phone is expected to feature a significantly reduced display crease due to a new hinge structure and flexible glass, alongside potential upgrades like the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, 12GB RAM, and a possible 200MP main camera.

articles.title: Marketing's new puppet master: Influencing the shopper choices with AI personalisation
articles.summary: Myntra utilizes AI-driven personalization to offer outfits matching user's style and size. Starbucks suggests drinks based on past orders and other factors. Netflix curates content recommendations using AI and Nike leverages AI for custom sneakers and workout plans, enhancing their product and service offerings through personalized experiences.

articles.title: Alberta family designs app to help Canadians buy Canadian
articles.author: Craig Momney
articles.summary: Ryan and Cathy Checora launched O SCANada, an AI-powered app on February 3, designed to help shoppers identify Canadian-made products by scanning barcodes or searching product names. The app provides information on the product's origin and suggests Canadian alternatives if a product isn't Canadian-made. An android version of O SCANada is planned for future release.

articles.title: Creatives React: The Cases For and Against Hellmann's Super Bowl Ad With Meg Ryan and Billy Crystal
articles.author: Lauren Johnson
articles.summary: Hellmann's launched a Super Bowl ad campaign, revisiting the 'When Harry Met Sally' scene to promote Big Mayo. The advertisement stars Meg Ryan, Billy Crystal, and Sydney Sweeney and it is an attempt to target a younger audience with nostalgia.

articles.title: Dyson Supersonic Nural hair dryer on sale for $549
articles.author: Olivia Scott
articles.summary: Dyson's Supersonic Nural Intelligent Hair Dryer is introduced as a high-performance hair tool prioritizing scalp health and hair protection. The dryer features five attachments, including a Wave+Curl diffuser for wavy and curly hair. It automatically adjusts heat and airflow to minimize heat damage and maintain hair color.

articles.title: Monday Morning Quarterbacking The Super Bowl Ads.
articles.author: Seth Matlins
articles.summary: Several companies showcased their products and services during the Super Bowl with accompanying advertisements. Instacart tweaked celebrity endorsements, DoorDash highlighted a clear benefit, Google Gemini/Pixel demonstrated its usage, Intuit Quick Books emphasized ease of use, Nike worked on creative and brand renaissance, Him and Hers focused on being differentiating, and Poppi provided a clear reason to choose them over others.

articles.title: Blue Digital Media Transforms Content Marketing with AI-Driven Educational Strategies
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Blue Digital Media launched a new AI-driven platform. This platform revolutionizes content marketing by enabling brands to craft educational narratives, enhancing thought leadership and audience engagement. The platform merges AI with educational content marketing.

articles.title: Collective Audience Begins Next Phase of Global Expansion With Launch of Collective Audience Europe
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: CAUD, a performance advertising and media innovator, launched CA Europe on February 10, 2025. This new division empowers European advertisers and publishers with cutting-edge tools and data technology. The launch signifies the culmination of several years of technology stack development.

articles.title: UGG finally has the alway sold-out Goldenstar clog back in stock — but it won't ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: UGG has restocked its Goldenstar Clog, making it available again for customers who have been waiting.

articles.title: BYD Sealion 7 Set For India Launch – Expected Range, Battery And Top Features
articles.author: Zeenews
articles.summary: BYD will launch its new electric SUV, the Sealion 7, in India. The official launch date is set for February 17th, following its showcase at the Auto Expo 2025.

articles.title: Innovative Pic 2 Cal App Streamlines Event Management with a Revolutionary Calendar Syncing Approach
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Pic2Cal.xyz, is launched as a new web tool. This innovative tool addresses the frustration of missing important events despite having numerous digital notifications.

articles.title: T-Mobile goes live with beta of satellite phone service for the US
articles.author: The Register
articles.summary: T-Mobile US launched a new service: free text messages for users on its own and rival networks. This offer is available during a test period.

articles.title: Suzuki Swift gets dual-tone paint treatment
articles.author: Sowetan Live
articles.summary: Suzuki introduces a new dual-tone paintwork option for its fourth-generation Swift. This new feature provides customers with additional customization choices for the vehicle.

articles.title: Need a new vacuum? These 3 will transform how you clean
articles.author: Lwv Manatee County
articles.summary: Roborock launched three new robot vacuum product lines on February 10th: the Saros 10, Saros 10R, and F25 series. The Saros 10 is a deep-cleaning expert with a thin design and advanced mopping system. The Saros 10R features advanced obstacle avoidance technology and a fast-charging dock. The F25 series includes four wet-dry vacuum cleaner models with a flat design and JawScrapers technology. Special discounts are available for all products from February 10-16.
